wikitext.*:
'''Vincent Trought''' ([[8 April|April 8]], [[1893]] - [[20 January|January 20]], [[1912]]) was a classmate of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] at [[King Edward's School]], and one of the [[T.C.B.S.]]. He was the first of Tolkien's friends to die (of illness); his place in the T.C.B.S. was taken over by [[Geoffrey Bache Smith]]. 
==References==
* ''[[Tolkien and the Great War]]'' by [[John Garth]].
